categories.title: Research & AI
categories.summary: Pioneering AI for accessibility with a focus on Sign Language Recognition.

items.title: Resolving Interclass Similarities in Sign Language
items.description: Developed an adaptive loss function for Azerbaijani Sign Language recognition.
items.full_detail: Developed a machine learning model for recognizing Azerbaijani Sign Language, with a specific focus on resolving interclass gesture similarities through adaptive loss functions. Presented at IEEE Young Researchers Conference on AI & Big Data.
